root.name: Mega Man Maverick Hunter X
root.description: OverviewSimilar toMega Man Powered Up, Mega Man X Maverick Hunter remakes the original Mega Man X with a few upgrades and tweaks. The core formula of the original game is kept intact.Upgrades and DifferencesVile is now a playable characterFully remade 2.5D graphicsAnime FMV sequencesVoice actingRemade scriptFeatures a 20 minute OVA: "The Day of Sigma."New playable character: VileNew difficulty settingsNew musicSlightly restructured levelsAbility to save; no passwordsEnergy tank, heart, and power-up stations rearrangedAbitlty to escape a level before having completed it
